title: Zombies - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 7/11/17
itunes:title: Zombies - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 7/11/17
description:
George Noory and guest Jonathon Maberry discuss the mythology of zombies, why Hollywood continues to be fascinated with the monsters and whether there could be a zombie apocalypse soon.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
